description.S1: Constable Reyes of Edgewater has placed a bounty on dangerous marauders plaguing the region.

blurb.B1: Speak to Constable Reyes in Edgewater to receive this quest.
blurb.B2: You can then set off toward the several marauder camps to defeat their leaders and get the loot.
blurb.B3: The fingers can be collected in any order and can be turned in to Reyes as they are collected for their individual rewards.

description.S1: Doc Maybell is wanted for murder and crimes against the region.
description.S2: Kill her and bring back a finger as proof.

description.S1: Bertie Cotton is an ex-vicar turned vicious marauder.
description.S2: Kill him and bring back a finger as proof.

description.S1: Guillaume Antrim is a dangerous marauder.
description.S2: Kill him and bring back a finger as proof.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Welcome to the Spacer's Choice Constabulary. We are Halcyon's leading brand in frontier justice.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: The office is running a promotion. Purchase three criminal investigations and the fourth one's free.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Something to report?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: If you need help with your marauder problem, I'm for hire.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I've got some questions for you, if you don't mind.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Goodbye.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: As a Spacer's Choice Constable, I am authorized to grant you legal authority toward apprehending wanted criminals.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Know how to carry yourself in a fight? I've got bounties out for these three marauders.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Cross 'em off and bring me their fingers. Just one per marauder, please. I'll dust off the old fingerprint roller.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: As long as your questions fall within acceptable margins of curiosity.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So who do you work for? Spacer's Choice or Edgewater?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Never mind.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: If this is the setup to a joke, you should know I've never found anything amusing in my life.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: I don't serve Edgewater. Edgewater, and the entire region of Emerald Vale, serves Spacer's Choice.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Who does Spacer's Choice answer to?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That sounds like slavery.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So you're basically a bureaucrat.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Thanks for your time.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Spacer's Choice is a wholly owned subsidiary of Universal Defense Logistics, which occupies a seat on the Halcyon Holdings Corporation.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Also known as the Board. I must admit, it bothers me that you don't already know this.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There was one other thing.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Careful, stranger. Talk like that comes dangerously close to sedition.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Flattery won't get you anywhere with me. The bureaucracy is a noble profession, but not all of us are gifted enough to serve in it.
